summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Settings page. All features working correctly: Language selector (4 languages), Data Providers section (Yahoo Finance, Finnhub, Alpha Vantage with priority reordering), Test buttons, Custom API Keys switch with input fields, CoinGecko crypto provider, and Save Settings button.
passed_tests: Settings page loads correctly after login
Language selector displays all 4 languages (EN, FR, DE, ES) with flags
Language selection works - clicking French updates UI to French
Language selection persists and can be changed back to English
Data Providers section displays Yahoo Finance with priority 1
Data Providers section displays Finnhub with priority 2 and 'API Key' badge
Data Providers section displays Alpha Vantage with priority 3 and 'API Key' badge
Yahoo Finance shows 'Free' badge
Test button for Yahoo Finance works - shows green checkmark on success
Provider priority can be reordered using up/down arrows
Moving Yahoo Finance down changes Finnhub to priority 1
Moving provider back up restores original order
Custom API Keys switch toggles correctly
When Custom API Keys enabled, Finnhub API Key input field appears
When Custom API Keys enabled, Alpha Vantage API Key input field appears
API Key input fields have show/hide password toggle (eye icon)
API Key input fields have helpful links to get free keys
CoinGecko crypto provider is displayed with 'Free' badge
CoinGecko shows green checkmark indicating it's working
Save Settings button works - shows 'API settings saved' toast
All required data-testid attributes are present for testing
seed_data_creation: Created new test user for Settings page testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Settings page fully implemented and tested. Key test IDs: settings-page, language-settings-card, api-settings-card, language-option-{code}, provider-{id}, test-{id}, use-custom-keys-switch, finnhub-key-input, alphavantage-key-input, save-api-settings. All 4 languages working. All 3 stock providers (Yahoo Finance, Finnhub, Alpha Vantage) with reordering. CoinGecko for crypto. Custom API keys feature working.
